Related Character(s): 隼
Связанный символ (и): 隼

鵻字的基本解释

鵻
zhuī
古书上指鹁鸪（一种天将雨或刚晴时常在树上咕咕叫的鸟）：“翩翩者鵻，载飞载下。”

鵻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuī］
［《廣韻》職追切，平脂，章。］
(1)鸟名。一种小鸠。
(2)草名。又名益母草。

鵻字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵻； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第02
【廣韻】職追切【韻會】【正韻】朱惟切，?音錐。小鳩，卽今白鳩。【說文】祝鳩也。【詩·小雅】翩翩者鵻。【毛傳】鵻，夫不也。【鄭箋】謹慤孝順之鳥也。本作隹。【爾雅·釋鳥】隹其，鳺鴀。【疏】隹，一名䳕鴀。今楚鳩。按鵻名不一，曰隹其，曰祝鳩，曰鳺鴀，曰鵴鳩，曰?鳩，曰楚鳩，曰荆鳩，曰䳕鳩，曰康鳩，曰?鳩，曰?鷱，曰鷿鷱，曰鳻鳩，曰乳鳩，皆鵻之別名。詳見詩緝。又靑鵻，本草，一名黃褐侯。?原刻从朗从鳥。?鷱或作?鷎。

鵻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鵻字的起名意思

暂无。

鵻
Basic explanation of words
鵻
zhuī
The ancient book refers to the wren (a kind of bird that often croaks on the tree when it rains or when it is sunny): "The flamboyant scorpion, fly down."
鵻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuī］
["Guangyun" job search, Pingzhi, chapter. ]
(1) The name of the bird. A kind of small dove.
(2) Cursive name. Also known as motherwort.
鵻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵻; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 Page 02
[Guang Yun] Job Pursuit [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] Zhu Weiqie,? Sound cone. Little dove, now white dove. [Said the text] Zhu Jiu also. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The elegant man. [Mao Chuan] Fu, not the husband. [Zheng Jian] I would like to be a bird of filial piety. This is a falcon. 【Erya·Shiniao】Kiqi, 鳺鴀. 【Sparse】Fu, a piping. Jin Chujiu. According to the different names of the 鵻, it is called 隹qi, zhu dove, 鳺鴀, 鵴dove, 鳺鴀, chu dove, Jing dove, pi dove, Kang dove, 深dove, 鷱鷱, It is called 鷿鷱, called 鵻鵱, called 鵻鵻, all aliases of 鵻. See poems for details. Also 靑鵻, Materia Medica, a yellow-brown Hou. ? The original engraved from Lang from the bird.鷱 or as 鷱.
